PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12482022-11-25,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  , 
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
SubjectOrder Amending Certain Conditions of the Canada Energy Regulator Report - NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. - GH-002-2020 and Directing the Commission of the Canada Energy Regulator to Issue a Certificate for the West Path Delivery 2023 Project
PrecisOrder (1) amending certain conditions of the Canada Energy Regulator Report - NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD. - GH-002-2020; and (2) directing the Commission of the Canada Energy Regulator to issue a certificate for the WEST PATH DELIVERY 2023 PROJECT in order to expand the existing NOVA Gas Transmission Limited natural gas distribution system in Alberta.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending Certain Conditions of the Canada Energy Regulator Report - NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. - GH-002-2020 and Directing the Commission of the Canada Energy Regulator to Issue a Certificate for the West Path Delivery 2023 Project
precis: Order (1) amending certain conditions of the Canada Energy Regulator Report - NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD. - GH-002-2020; and (2) directing the Commission of the Canada Energy Regulator to issue a certificate for the WEST PATH DELIVERY 2023 PROJECT in order to expand the existing NOVA Gas Transmission Limited natural gas distribution system in Alberta.
